Package managment

Class UserAlreadyHasAccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • managment.UserAlreadyHasAccountController
  • public class UserAlreadyHasAccountController
extends java.lang.Object
    controller for Useralreadyhasaccountscreen we get to this screen via hpyer link in RegNewAccountP1 here a user inputs ID for an account that already exists if the id is linked to an account user can move to RegNewAccountP2 without reentering account details

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String account_id
      static variable that we move to regNewAccountP2 containing the users inputted id
      private javafx.scene.control.Label id_error_lbl
      display error in id to user
      private javafx.scene.control.TextField id_lbl
      text area to input id
      private javafx.scene.control.Button next_btn
      button to confirm input

      Constructor Description
      UserAlreadyHasAccountController()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void initialize()
      We initialize the controller by setting a verifyListener to verify valid ID input We also check according to the database if there is an account with ID inputted or not
      (package private) void NextPage​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Event for button when the user enters ID and presses button if the ID is indeed the database we move user to regnewaccountp2screen and hide the popup
